channel.title: Example longform blog
channel.description: This is a longform theme example for my lightweight blogging framework.

item.title: Tags and dates
item.description: Post with lots of tags. Also date in filename.

item.title: Post with date in the front matter
item.description: Because sometimes you need to cheat and backdate a post

item.title: Extended Markdown
item.description: Footnotes, code blocks, table of contents, tables

item.title: Post with no date
item.description: In which `os` proceeds to incorrectly interpolate the file created timestamp
